newsitem.title: USA: Texas Utils Comanche nuke hits full output.
newsitem.headline: Texas Utils Comanche nuke hits full output.

text.p: Texas Utilities Co's 1,150 megawatt (MW) Comanche Peak 2 nuclear power plant was back at full power after its output was trimmed earlier this week, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) said Wednesday.
The unit's power production was cut to about half its capacity last week while repairs were carried out on a main feedwater pump.
The neighboring unit, Comanche Peak 1, continued to operate at 100 percent of its 1,150 MW rated capacity, the NRC said.
The Comanche Peak generating facility is in Glen Rose, Texas.
